artist: Ange-Laurent de La Live de Jully
title: No. 1, from "Recuëil de Caricatures Dessinées par J. Saly et Gravées par A.L. De Lalive D.J."
description: full-length profile of a stoop-shouldered man holding a bundle of papers under his arm, on which the volume name is printed; man has a very high forehead
creditline: Gift of funds from Janet and Winton Jones and John E. Andrus III
